useCase.name: Notify Missing Documents
useCase.description: Notify staff about missing documents in application

preconditions.precondition: Staff is logged into the application

successEndConditions.condition: Staff receives confirmation of missing documents notification

mainSequence.step: Staff identifies missing documents on Application Detail Page
Fetch missing documents from the Backend Server
Query missing documents in the Database
Notify missing documents through the Notification System
Display confirmation of notifications sent on Application Detail Page
